subject: Sports Injuries
Baseball
Ankles (Body Part)
lead_paragraph: Joba Chamberlain had surgery on Thursday after dislocating his ankle on a kids’ trampoline in Tampa, a potentially career-threatening injury for the Yankees pitcher.
snippet: Joba Chamberlain had surgery on Thursday after dislocating his ankle on a kids’ trampoline in Tampa, a potentially career-threatening injury for the Yankees pitcher.
